rukus.text: 90|1|yeung( a l laoh) sbath nung tikrong nih( tikrong mea kkah) .
90|2|khn del anak( mou ham meat) chea anak del rsanow knong tikrong nih .
90|3|haey trong ban sbath nung aupouk mnoussa lok( a da) ning  anak del ban kaet( kaunchaw robsa keat) .
90|4|chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok aoy sthetnow  knong pheap lombak .
90|5|tae ke kitthea  kmean anaknea ach mean anoupheap leu khluon ke te ryy
90|6|daoy ke niyeay tha  khnhom ban chamnay tropy sa mb tde yeang  chraen .
90|7|tae ke kitthea  kmean norna mneak bankheunh ke te ryy
90|8|tae yeung minban bangkeut ke aoy mean phnek muoykou
90|9|ning andat muoy  haeyning bbaurmat te ryy
90|10|haey yeung themtang ban changaoulobangheanh meakra pir(la ning  akrak) dl ke tiet phng .
90|11|te ke minban daer now leu meakra del lombak( meakra tow  kan pheap chokchy) laey .
90|12|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  meakra del lombak chea avei noh
90|13|ku kar daohleng khnhom bamreu dachthlai aoy mean setthi seripheap .
90|14|ryy phdal chamneiahar nowknong thngai muoy del mean kroh tourphiksa .
90|15|( ryy phdal chamneiahar dl) kaunkamprea del chea nheatesandean .
90|16|ryy anak kreikr del kmeanoavei saoh .
90|17|banteabmk  ke ban klaycha mnoussa mneak knongchamnaom anak  del mean chomnue  ning ban phdephdam knea aoy meankar atthmot  haeyning ban  phdephdam knea aoy mean kdei me tda krounea .
90|18|anak teangnoh kuchea krom del ttuol banhchi daoy daisdam .
90|19|haey puok del kmean chomnue nung ayeat  robsa yeung puok  ke kuchea puok del ttuol banhchi daoy dai che  v ng .
90|20|phleung nork krobadandab leu puokke yeang chit .
